title: New: NO – Leave The Door Wide Open
content:
Long time CitR favourites NO are set to release their highly anticipated debut album, El Prado via Arts & Crafts on 18 February, and have preceded the LP with lead single Leave The Door Wide Open.

Also the opening track of the record, it’s rather fitting that the ever powerful vocals of frontman Bradley Hanan Carter begin the track, with their somber, dulcet tones. Immediately anthemic, it’s a staple part of their fiery live shows; just waiting to be introduced to the festival circuit.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
